General.Name: MMS Ventures Bhd
General.Description: MMS Ventures Berhad, an investment holding company, provides automation solutions for LED, semiconductor, and the OEM/ODM markets. The company operates through two segments, Manufacture of Automated Systems and Machinery; and Development of Software. It manufactures automated systems and machine; and develops software. The company has operations in Malaysia, the United States, Europe, rest of Asia, and Australia. MMS Ventures Berhad was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Bayan Lepas, Malaysia.
